com.spazedog.lib.rootfw3.extenders

Class InstanceExtender.InstanceRootFW

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spazedog.lib.rootfw3.RootFW
      • com.spazedog.lib.rootfw3.extenders.InstanceExtender.InstanceRootFW
  • Enclosing class:
    InstanceExtender

    protected static class InstanceExtender.InstanceRootFW
extends RootFW
    This is an extended class of the RootFW class. It's job is to implement the feature of not disconnecting locked connections. The class is protected, so it is not possible to store instances as InstanceRootFW but only as RootFW, as the changes are only meant for internal purposes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.spazedog.lib.rootfw3.RootFW
